SELECT standUpVisitorTotal,actualVisitorTotal,reservationVisitorTotal FROM
( SELECT count(a) AS standUpVisitorTotal FROM (select count(reservationId) AS a FROM t_reservation
and actualVisitStatus = 0 GROUP BY phone) b ) standUpVisitorTotalTable ,
( SELECT count(c) AS actualVisitorTotal FROM (select count(reservationId) AS c FROM t_reservation
and actualVisitStatus = 1 GROUP BY phone) d ) actualVisitorTotalTable ,
( SELECT count(e) AS reservationVisitorTotal FROM (select count(reservationId) AS e FROM t_reservation
GROUP BY phone) f ) reservationVisitorTotalTable

SELECT accessCode FROM t_accesscode where userId = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_reservation set actualVisitTime = now(), actualVisitStatus = 1 where TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,NOW(),reservationLoginTime) >= -60 and phone = #{phone} and actualVisitStatus = 2
update t_reservation set actualVisitStatus = 0 where TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,reservationLoginTime,#{localTime}) >= 1 and actualVisitStatus = 2
mapper.select: SELECT accessCode,codeStatus,expireTime,userId FROM t_accesscode where userId = #{id} and codeStatus = 1

(SELECT count(actualVisitStatus) as actualSomebodyTotal FROM t_reservation
and phone = #{phone} and actualVisitStatus = 1 ) actualSomebodyTotalTable ,
